name: run-script-os
description: run-script-os is a tool that will let you use generic run scripts that will pass through to os specific run scripts.

scripts.example: echo '0. Call either npm test, npm run test, or npm run-script test and check out the output to see how pre/post scripts work with run-script-os'
scripts.pretest: echo '1. Pretest (Generic) called first when running npm test'
scripts.test: echo '2. Test (Generic) runs transitioning to OS specific code' && run-script-os
scripts.posttest: echo '6. Posttest (Generic) is finally called after all of the OS specific commands are called'

author: Charlie Guse (https://github.com/charlesguse/run-script-os)
